function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased adoption of e-services and online retailing due to the pandemic","Impact":"Reduced in-person interaction leading to decreased human touch and physical contact","Mitigation":"Encourage safe in-person interactions with hygiene practices, and promote the use of contactless technology in retail stores","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, touchless kiosks, and digital signage","People":"Consumers, retail staff, service providers","Owner":"Retailers, service providers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Change in consumer privacy attitudes due to COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Potential decline in consumers' privacy concerns and increased willingness to share personal information for commercial and contact tracing purposes","Mitigation":"Educate consumers on privacy protection measures and advocate for transparent data usage policies","Technologies":"Privacy-enhancing technologies, transparent data privacy tools","People":"Consumers, data protection authorities","Owner":"Retailers, technology companies, data protection authorities"},{"Description":"Shift in consumer behavior towards online shopping and e-commerce","Impact":"Transition of less digital-savvy consumers to online shopping, changing shopping habits and preferences","Mitigation":"Provide digital literacy training and support for online shopping, enhance user experience for online platforms","Technologies":"Digital literacy tools, user-friendly e-commerce platforms","People":"Less digital-savvy consumers, retail staff, e-commerce providers","Owner":"Government, e-commerce companies, educational institutions"}]}
